column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2018
column14: Good strong color that nonetheless leans toward a natural look if my lip color looked that good.  Strong staying power; I apply @ twice per day.  After 5 minutes color doesn't transfer. I've been using this for years.  On the downside, it tends to dry lips slightly like most longstay lip color.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
column14: Love this lip tint. I'm ordering. Another! This lip color stays on and on. I'm Sold on it!

column6: It is the only lipstick that has ever lasted for me
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2018
column14: This is my go-to lipstick for years because it is the only one---and I mean the only one--that actually lasts through a meal and can last through many hours of a day or night. I love this color on me too and hope that Revlon continues to produce it. I have bought many high-end lipsticks but they do not deliver like this product.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2021
column14: This is my favorite lip gloss of all. It is my "go to" that I keep in every place.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
column14: This lipstick stays on me for more than 24 hours

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2019
column14: The cold was supposed to be nude but it was very dark. I threw it away. Waste of money.

column6: It lasts forever,eating, drinking, swimming you name it!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2015
column14: I am not going to ever buy a different lipstick. ..ever. ever. Ever. Why is it so hard to find this top tomato in the store?  I bought the last 3 on Amazon at one time.  I was scared they would stop making it.  Matte finish. Drying but lip gloss fixes that. Better than a stain. It's amazing. Must be made of airplane paint to stay on so well?

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
column14: I love this product. It is very long lasting. It stays on even when I eat something.  I mix different colors together as well. Love it
